message: @sinzone I don't have anything critical to say about the design/UI. I didn't actually attempt to use it (it's almost 4 am, I need sleep) so I can't comment on anything else.
I tried to browse the APIs created so far. It didn't let me to do so without creating an account. Can't you just list some popular APIs in your product?
Looks slick as hell in FF though
Layout is completely borked on Safari 4.0.2
Very sharp looking and I found everything I need to on the landing page. Concept seems a bit difficult to deal with but the effort is clearly there as is the potential. Well done.
@sinzone Yes, an invite would be appreciated so I can look at the core of your product quickly.
I'm loving this so far. To the extent of the public pages. An invite would be awesome.
